meanings.definition: To boast more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: She always outboasts her friends about her achievements.
meanings.sent2: He outboasts everyone in the class about his new toy.
meanings.sent3: The little bird outboasts the big parrot with its loud chirping.
meanings.sent4: The sun outboasts the moon in brightness during the day.
meanings.sent5: The lion outboasts the hyena with its mighty roar.

meanings.sent1: The magician outboasts his rival with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent2: She outboasts her siblings with her wild stories.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outboasts the chipmunk by claiming it can fly.
meanings.sent4: The river outboasts the stream with its powerful current.
meanings.sent5: The superhero outboasts the villain with tales of bravery.
